For memes and shitposting about everything that happens in our beloved "Official Ruqqus Discord"
 
---

## Posting Rules


Rule 1: 

This guild is for shitposting about people/events in the Ruqqus Discord server. Any post that is not related to this will be kicked to +general. If you need help regarding the discord server, +askruqqus, +general, or +hub would gladly accept your questions.


Rule 2:

No spamming. Spamming would be considered any of the following:

* Same-format posting within a day

* Same-content posting within a day (Same content, different format)


Spammed posts will get kicked and repeated offenses results in being exiled.


Rule 3: 

No reposts: reposts are cringe. Any reposts will be kicked.

This guild is for shitposting about people/events in the Ruqqus Discord server. Any post that is not related to this will be kicked to +general. If you need help regarding the discord server, +askruqqus, +general, or +hub would gladly accept your questions.

You have two choices here:

Actually, thats the only choice.

For example, the trans panic defense still exists in the majority of states. 

You don't have to deal with the "cis panic defense" 

Also, the Trump administration allowed several anti-lgbt orders, like health care providers being able to deny trans people healthcare service for the sole reason that they're trans. 

You don't have to deal with "healthcare providers don't have to serve cis people"

And they allowed the dhs to not recognise gay marriages as valid marriages or serve people based on religious reasons. 

You don't have to worry about someone single handedly invalidating your marriage and deny you service for religious reasons. 

Lord knows people would be crying if it became legal and acceptable to deny people around the country service because they are Christian or cis.
